channel.title: Fudge on Welcome to my site
channel.description: Recent content in Fudge on Welcome to my site

item.title: Two minute Fudge!
item.description: Intro I love fudge. There. I said it. Sometimes I like to reward myself with a little bit after work. Today I did exactly that, except that when I arrived at the kitchen I didn’t have any. Zut alors! No fear. We can make some! And the best bit? It doesn’t involve any scalding hot saucepans full of sugar. This fudge only requires two minutes in the microwave and an hour in the fridge1.
